name: aileen
cooked:
Hello!

This blog post, http://www.oshwa.org/tag/international-branches/, describes and links to documentation on how to make a branch of OSHWA!

This document describes the objectives and requirements in opening an OSHWA branch, http://www.oshwa.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/OSHWA_BRANCHING_CHAPTER_V1.pdf, and you can fill out this form to let us know where and who you are interesting in opening the branch with, https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1eahqBVhbaC1PGixpgtizbnc69Y79F4i-7hcwxZ7eVjQ/viewform.
raw:
Hello!

This blog post, http://www.oshwa.org/tag/international-branches/, describes and links to documentation on how to make a branch of OSHWA!

This document describes the objectives and requirements in opening an OSHWA branch, http://www.oshwa.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/OSHWA_BRANCHING_CHAPTER_V1.pdf, and you can fill out this form to let us know where and who you are interesting in opening the branch with, https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1eahqBVhbaC1PGixpgtizbnc69Y79F4i-7hcwxZ7eVjQ/viewform.
